name: A Knight in the Graveyard
description:
Theme: Heal
You are a paladin that was sent to clear the undead from the graveyard. Unfortunately, they just won't stop coming and are getting stronger too! Try to survive for as long as possible and set a new high score.

This is my first game jam and the first game I've made since graduating college.
Comments, Feedback, Ideas, and Opinions are warmly welcomed. 
Follow me on Twitter @Kirkalish (I plan on doing more with social media soon)

  • Controls
    • WASD to Move
    • Hold Shift to Sprint
    • Space to Jump
    • Hold Left Moused Button to Attack
    • Hold Right Mouse Button to Block (WIP)
    • F to cast the Healing Field Spell
    • Escape or P to pause (Controls are also listed here)
  • Important Information
    • Active graves have a red glow and can spawn enemies.
    • Active Graves are randomized periodically.
    • Every minute that goes by increases the difficulty (More enemies and they deal more damage and move faster.)
    • When you hear thunder the difficulty increases.

I originally had more planned like a way to level up the player and villager that need to be saved. I plan on adding the villager and the map after the Jam is over.

References
